column13: [ANN] Flowfeed- the premiere social platform to buy and sell content/information
column14: -Aim-  Flowfeed aims to be the number one social platform globally to buy and sell content and information. There is currently no platform on the market where content providers can easily and quickly get paid for their content. A platform that is dynamic and in real-time. Flowfeed aims to solve this problem. In a changing world there are a few social media platforms which dominate global activity and are known throughout the world. However, it is becoming more and more apparent that the best content may not be found on these platforms. And this makes sense, as the content providers are not justifiably rewarded. They are not incentivized. For example a well known actor, professional sportsman or head of industry with hundreds of thousands of Twitter followers are not likely to ever convey their most sought-after information. However if each of their followers paid a few dollars for such content then this would change as they would be incentivized for doing so. This can quickly become a lucrative revenue stream for influencers or content providers that have built up their profile and built up their following. the Flowfeed platform is for anyone and everyone. Everyone has a chance to build their profile and following and you will be able to convey your information via posts, document uploads (including images and videos) and podcasts. But of course those with already large followings on other free social platforms have the ability to build significant revenue potentials streams quickly, as they can advertise to their followers on these platforms to also follow them on Flowfeed.   -The Team-  Flowfeed was founded by a group of entrepreneurs looking to change and disrupt how information is communicated and shared in many industries around the world. The team has grown to include experienced finance professionals, software development experts and media and advertising experts. We come from a diverse background of industries with a passion for entrepreneurship and disruption. We know just how valuable a platform like Flowfeed will be to many industries and fields of expertise globally. The Flowfeed team’s vision is to change the way valuable content and information is distributed. And to build a platform and community where the people being rewarded are the actual people who make the platform valuable:  ‘The content providers.’   Additionally, the founders also envision that Flowfeed’s cryptocurrency based platform will eventually become the primary blockchain solution to enable content transfer, information transfer, and knowledge transfer. With time and community backing, Flowfeed tokens may be used on any platform where the transfer of content, information and knowledge is required.       Website Link: https://www.flowfeed.com/  Whitepaper Link: https://www.flowfeed.com/assets/pdf/flowfeed-overview.pdf  Quick Presentation: https://www.flowfeed.com/assets/pdf/flowfeed-deck.pdf   The pre-fundraiser has begun in October. Free coins are on offer simply by signing up. The actual FlowFeed fundraiser will begin in November where a 25% bonus will be allocated for early contributors.
